title: PMS 2.0 745 - Thursday Night Football Preview, Von Miller, Coach P's Keys With Chuck Pagano LIVE From The ThunderDome, Darius Butler, & AJ Hawk
description: On today’s show, Pat, Darius Butler, AJ Hawk, and the boys chat about tonight’s Thursday Night Football game between the Steelers and the Browns, chat about the exclusive SuperBoost available only on FanDuel, and make their picks. They also discuss what is going on with the Boston Celtics, the Brett Favre situation, Bill Belichick’s comments about Lamar Jackson, and everything else going on around the NFL as we move into week 3 of the NFL season. Joining the progrum to chat about their massive win over the Titans on Monday Night Football in what is hopefully a weekly guest spot is future Hall of Fame Defensive End for the Buffalo Bills, Von Miller (1:29:38-1:47:48). Later, former Head Coach of the Indianapolis Colts, Chuck Pagano, joins the boys LIVE from the ThunderDome for his weekly Coach P's Keys segment, where he takes us inside a team meeting and gives the keys to victory for both the Steelers and the Browns (1:47:50-2:23:55). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
